title: Database of all Department of Interior unmanned aircraft system flights

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

The full list of flights recorded in the department's "OAS-2U UAS Flight Use Reporting Form." I request that a database dump with all available columns be released.

I have reason to believe the department's Office of Aviation Services manages its fleet of unmanned aircraft systems. That is spelled out by the document "DOI OPERATIONAL PROCEDURES MEMORANDUM (OPM) - 11", You can see the document here: https://www.doi.gov/sites/doi.gov/files/opm-11.pdf You may wish to forward this request to their office.

That document also specifies that form OAS-2U should be filled out to record each flight. The form is available online here: https://amdtrainingdivision.az1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_5h8QBAMfoIjMM9T

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Welsh

title: List of all Department of Interior owned unmanned aircraft systems

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

A list of all unmanned aircraft systems, sometimes known as drones, owned by the department. I ask that the make, model, year and unique identifier of each craft be includes, as well as any other data tracked by your agency. 

I have reason to believe the department's Office of Aviation Services manages its fleet of unmanned aircraft systems. That is spelled out by the document "DOI OPERATIONAL PROCEDURES MEMORANDUM (OPM) - 11", You can see the document here: https://www.doi.gov/sites/doi.gov/files/opm-11.pdf You may wish to forward this request to their office.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Welsh
